core

Class Queries

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Queries

  • public class Queries
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds SPARQL Queries and methods required for creating,updating and retrieving data from Jena Models and our datastore.
    Author:
    Stanislav Beran

      Query to get choice label and uri of buses
      (package private) static java.lang.String SELECT_DESCRIBE_QUERY
      Trivial imitiation of DESCRIBE QUERY selects triples where resource is either subject or object
      (package private) static java.lang.String SELECT_EVERYTHING

      Used by NewFormParser.java
      (package private) static java.lang.String TEMPLATE_SELECT_LABEL_COMMENT
      Query used by NewFormParser/CopyOfNewFormParser to get descripiton and label of the class for RDForm templates.
      (package private) static java.lang.String TEMPLATE_SELECT_LABEL_COMMENT_PROPERTY
      Query used by NewFormParser/CopyOfNewFormParser to get descripiton and label of the property associated with a class for RDForm templates.
      (package private) static java.lang.String TEMPLATE_SELECT_QUERY_ENDPOINT
      Query to get SPARQL query and endpoint where (label,value) choices are extracted from

      Deprecated. 
      Used with old RDFormParser to determine restriction of a resource

      Deprecated.

      • describeQuery

        public static com.hp.hpl.jena.query.ResultSet describeQuery(java.lang.String resource,
                                            java.lang.String DS)
        Query datastore for specific resource only triples which specifically contain resource as subject or object are returned.
        Parameters:
        resource - - IRI
        DS - - named graph of the dataset to be queried
        Returns:
        - ResultSet

      • getDescribe

        public static com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model getDescribe(java.lang.String resourceURI,
                                          com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m)
        This method returns Model of a resourceURI, if Model m is null it queries the whole datastore.(all named graphs)
        Parameters:
        resourceURI - - IRI to be described
        m - - Model to be queried
        Returns:
        - Model representation of the described IRI

      • ask

        public static boolean ask(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m,
          java.lang.String queryString,
          java.util.ArrayList<Parameter> params)
        Method handles ask queries
        Parameters:
        m - - model to be queried if null datastore is queried instead
        queryString - - SPARQL Query template
        params - - Parameters to populate query
        Returns:
        boolean true or false

      • populateQuery

        public static java.lang.String populateQuery(java.lang.String queryString,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Parameter> params,
                             boolean update)
        Populate query with custom bindings and add default system prefixes to it.
        Parameters:
        queryString - - SPARQL query template
        params - - parameters(custom bindings) for SPARQL template
        update - - SPARQL UPDATE query ?
        Returns:
        populated query String with system defined prefixes
